item.title: Setting up personal OKR [JFM-2021]
item.description: If you work at the intersection of Product-Management and Artificial-Intelligence, I would love to connect and discuss with you regarding your experience/learnings. Can we connect over email OR Twitter? This article describes the approach I’m following to set personal goals for myself, in the form of Objectives and Key-results (OKR). If you are new to OKR, scroll down to the Resources section for more details. A publically available worksheet for my personal OKRs for January-February-March 2021 is available here.
